products.description: A urine bag is a key urological device. It's used to collect and store urine from patients, often attached to catheters. Made of durable material, it's leak - resistant and easy to empty, ensuring comfort and hygiene.

codes.description: Description: 2000ml, with 110cm tube, slide tap valve

products.description: A Basic Urine Drainage Bag is a fundamental medical device. It's designed to collect urine from patients, typically connected to a catheter. Simple in construction, it allows for straightforward monitoring and disposal, ensuring patient well-being.

products.description: The CathVantage™ Portable Hydrophilic Intermittent Catheter is a compact and portable option that's about half the size of standard catheters and has a non-medical appearance.

codes.description: Type: Rotating type · Description: Female · Size: 08FR · Effective length: 7-9CM

products.description: A Catheter Spigot is a crucial part of a catheter system. It controls the flow of fluids, allowing for precise drainage or administration. Its easy-to-operate design ensures efficient and hygienic management of catheter - related procedures.

Hydrophilic catheters are a type of pre-lubricated single-use, urinary catheter with a special coating applied to the catheter during the manufacturing process. When introduced to sterile water or sterile saline, the hydrophilic coating is activated and the catheter is ready for insertion.

A low bed urine bag is a practical solution for patients. Placed near the floor, it reduces the risk of backflow. Its design allows for discreet collection, ensuring comfort and maintaining proper urine drainage during rest or limited mobility.
The male urinal is designed to prevent spills and odors with an attached snap-on lid. It features a sturdy grip for easy handling and can be used in several positions.

The Nelaton Catheter is a widely used medical device. Made of soft, flexible material, it is inserted into the body for fluid drainage, like urine. Its simple, non-indwelling design ensures patient comfort during use.

products.description: The pear-shaped drainage bag offers a unique design advantage. Its pear-like form allows for efficient urine collection and sediment settlement. This design reduces the risk of blockages, ensuring smooth and reliable drainage.

products.description: The rectal plastic catheters are used for examination of rectum, administration of medicines and rectal drainage. One end of the catheter has central opening and the other has color plug.

products.description: Rectal catheters are specialized medical tools. They're inserted into the rectum to drain feces, relieve constipation, or administer medications. Their design prioritizes patient comfort and effective treatment delivery.

products.description: The Silicone catheter is a two-way catheter indicated for routine drainage of the bladder. It is a urinary catheter intended for short as well as long term drainage of the bladder. For routine and postoperative drainage.

Silicone male catheter is a self-adhering catheter that is made from odor-free silicone. It is latex-free to reduce skin irritation.Transparent and clear, allowing visual inspections without the need to remove the catheter.

products.description: Triangular Graduates are innovative measuring tools. Their triangular shape provides enhanced stability, while clear markings ensure accurate volume readings. Ideal for a range of laboratory and medical applications.

A unisex urinal is a versatile and inclusive solution for various settings. It's designed to meet the needs of all genders, offering convenience and functionality. Its user - friendly design promotes ease of use and cleanliness.

The urine meter bag revolutionizes urological management. Equipped with a built-in measuring system, it enables accurate quantification of urine volume. This empowers healthcare professionals to make more informed decisions about patient care.

products.description: The urine meter drainage bag is a smart addition to urological care. It features an integrated measuring mechanism, allowing for precise monitoring of urine output. This data - driven design aids healthcare providers in accurate patient assessment.

products.description: A Urology Drain Bag is essential for patients with urinary issues. It safely collects and stores urine, featuring a secure connection to catheters. Its design allows for easy monitoring and emptying, ensuring patient hygiene and comfort.

products.description: Urology Drain Bag is designed to fit most hoop frames. This unique design includes a vinyl flap that goes under the patient to direct fluids into the bag, a flexible 6' long hose, and a tissue filter to allow for the collection of the tissue specimens. This optional design makes things safer and easier for your OR personnel by allowing them to utilize your existing suction equipment. The result is better management and control of infectious fluid waste.
